Package it.hackcaffebabe.netutil.mail

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthenticationFactory
    Class that describe the authentication feature.
    Email
    Simple class that describe and validate an Email address.
    To instance an object of this class you could use the appropriate constructor or the setter method.
    MailerManager
    Class that describe the mail primitive ( login and send ) to send a email.
    It's needs a properties file like this that describe the server information:
    SimpleMessage
    Simple class that represents the message that will be send as email.
    Use the follow example to create a simple email.
    After that use MailerManager class to send it
